Articles.Content: will we ever get it? i would be realy helpfull if workshop would get added so you can mod easialy.

will we ever get it? i would be realy helpfull if workshop would get added so you can mod easialy.

I'm going to guess not or at least not anytime soon. There's a sizable user base that purchased their copy of KSP direct from Squad who wouldn't have access to Steam without porting their license.

Are we really going to have this discussion AGAIN???

A simple title search for "Workshop" resulted in seven threads apart from this one. The majority locked as this has been discussed to death.
Because we should lock out half the players who mod their game. Yep. Totally. I get most of my game off steam, but when it comes to indie titles, I try to get it straight from the developers.

I am closing this thread as its topic is present on the What not to suggest List.

As mentioned above, this topic has been smashed around before and if you are interested in reading more, then please make use of the forum's search feature.

Rich
